attributes.action: The Right to know Where Peadophiles are
attributes.additional_details: Every Parent in the Country has a right to know if there are any Peadophiles living in our area. Every child in the country has a right to be safe. Parents Need to be aware of the risks living near our Children so we can do everything in our power to keep them SAFE. Peadophiles DO NOT have the right to PRIVACY.
